metadata.description: In the future, glistening buildings line the city's skyline. In the future, rich and powerful men wish to exploit power they don't fully comprehend. In the future, a new warrior emerges… a shapeshifter that will help the people rise against the forces of oppression! Luciano Saracino and Ariel Olivetti return to the savage world of Brutal Nature!
metadata.name: Brutal Nature: Concrete Fury
